replies.body:
Hey Welcome! I hope your enjoying it here so far :P 
Feel free to ask the staff or I any questions, we will be more than happy to help! 
In the future try to use the edit button to avoid creating spam.
:D

reply_to.body:
You have been on the forums for 7 months and have been here for a year.

Although you did take a break for 2 months starting in October, "New" is something I would not describe you as.

Nonetheless, here are the rules if you're unaware of them.
Feel free to ask any questions if you need help, we'll be more than happy to help you out.
reply_to.body_tagged:
You have been on the forums for 7 months and have been here for a year.

Although you did take a break for 2 months starting in October, "New" is something I would not describe you as.

Nonetheless, here are the rules if you're unaware of them.
Feel free to ask any questions if you need help, we'll be more than happy to help you out.

replies.body:
I'm sorry, I didn't know. 
My bad.

Let me start over.
Welcome to the Avicus Network!!
Here are the rules to the server if you're wondering where to find it.

If you have any questions at all. Don't be afraid to ask.
We'll be more than happy to help you out :)

Please forgive my ignorance, I was unaware that this account had been taken over by a new person.

If you have any questions, you can reply to me here and I'll do my best to help you out!

Similarly, you can ask the community as well by making topics and even by asking in-game
They're a cool bunch of people that'll definitely help you out!

Or, if you want a more official response, you can ask one of the awesome moderators and they'll point you in the right direction. Skype is a popular method way of communication as a lot of mods have Skype.
Teamspeak if also popular for Avicus.


Welcome to the Avicus Network!
